thread.section_title: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pets Best Pet Health Insurance | petsbest.com
thread.title: hoseshowmom
thread.title_full: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance reviewed by hoseshowmom

author: hoseshowmom
title: hoseshowmom
text:
I use Pets Best as a secondary insurance for my German.
Shepherd. The reason being is that my main insurance is with our military policy for house, auto, banking etc. I tried to increase Yarrow's insurance by another $5000, but for technical reasons it didn't work. Yarrow is a SAR K9, so I felt it necessary to have $10,000 on her. So I reached out to Pets Best, and insured her with them as well. They are very helpful and polite. The claim that I filed was for the difference our other insurance didn't pay. Pets Best paid in 7 working days after they received all the required paperwork. I have no complaints and am totally satisified.
